title: In the Garden Collection
description: Now available in one deluxe box set— Blue Dahlia , Black Rose ,  and  Red Lily —all three novels in #1  New York Times  bestselling author Nora Roberts’ In the Garden Trilogy.Against the backdrop of a house steeped in history and a thriving new gardening business, three women unearth the memories of the past and uncover a dangerous secret...This In the Garden Trilogy box set includes:BLUE DAHLIABLACK ROSERED LILY
author: Nora Roberts
